segments.text: Would you like to order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , can you recommend some steak ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I think pepper steak is quite good . Many guests like it very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK I will try it . Do you have a small portion ? I am afraid I can't finish the large one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes madam . I will give you the small one .
segments.speaker: S1
